title: Carlyle’s Currie Says Oil, Metals Markets Are ‘Underinvested’
description: Oil and metals markets are “substantially underinvested” and have significant upside, said Carlyle Group Inc.’s Jeff Currie, adding the longstanding oversupply narrative weighing down crude prices is overblown.
content: Oil and metals markets are “substantially underinvested” and have significant upside, said Carlyle Group Inc.’s Jeff Currie, adding the longstanding oversupply narrative weighing down crude prices is overblown.
